amendment.description: Amendment requires the Director of National Intelligence to report to Congress on the nexus between terrorist groups and wildlife trafficking, how wildlife trafficking impacts U.S. national security, and key actors and facilitators of wildlife trafficking.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 14 printed in House Report 114-155 to require the Director of National Intelligence to report to Congress on the nexus between terrorist groups and wildlife trafficking, how wildlife trafficking impacts U.S. national security, and key actors and facilitators of wildlife trafficking.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Poe (TX) amendment (A014) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Poe (TX) amendment (A014) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A014) offered by Mr. Poe (TX).
